title.rendered: AFN SIDE STEPS AND RAILS SUIT FORD RANGER PXII

content.rendered:
• Side Steps (steel tube design with checkered aluminum plate top – Hi-Lift Jack Points)   $850
  • Side Rails (steel tube design – only compatible with AFN Side Steps)  $450 Matte Black Powder Coated (Checkered Plates are Raw Aluminum)
